1.title: Part I
1.plot: The five remaining subjects from the Echo 49 facility race through the forest, mercilessly pursued by the facility guards. While Maven leads them ever deeper into the unknown, Lieutenant Harless lays his trap for Orion.

2.title: Part II
2.plot: One of the subjects lies dead; and the rest broken. Lieutenant Harless has activated the control chip inside Orion, leaving the subjects unable to flee. And all too soon a traitor will be revealed.

3.title: Part III
3.plot: Orion attempts to use the tracking chips to trick the guards, resulting in a confrontation with Private Nyx. Elsewhere Vela forces an imprisoned Maven to take the remaining subjects to the bunker - with Lieutenant Harless in close pursuit.

4.title: Part IV
4.plot: Orion and Harless have their final battle in the ruins outside the forest; while Maven leads the Echo guards into the secret bunker. Only two subjects will survive the revelation of Echo 49.

imdb.plot outline: Set in the not too distant future, Station: Echo 49 was built on another world in an effort to save humanity, should another world war break-out. Contact with Earth was lost, and Echo 48 assumed the worst. Without the proper supplies from Earth, Echo could not maintain control. Several of the subjects held in the facility escaped; pursued by Echo guards.
imdb.title: Echo's Wayward
plot: 23 subjects escaped from the remote facility Echo 49. Echo 49 dispatched 3 squads of facility guards to pursue the subjects. 3 weeks later, 5 subjects remained.::Anonymous
